column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////So-so ramen not worth the lines or the hype. So one night I decided to meet my wife and 2yo son after work here for dinner. They got here first. Even though it was not crowded at all
column2: the uppity hostess refused to seat them until I arrived
column3: even though my son was crying and upset from hunger; I show up a few minutes later to a screaming toddler. We could have been seated immediately once I arrived
column4: but screw that. We went next door at Piola where they've always treated us right and will ever return. Shame because the kids meal is a good deal
column5: but it I'll go to Tatsu-Ya nearby every day of the week and twice on Sundays for much better ramen and much friendlier staff. Or heck I'll go next door to Piola for pizza.
